name: SUINTERP
description: Interpolate traces using automatic event picking

parameter_descriptions.ninterp: Number of traces to output between each pair of input traces
parameter_descriptions.freq1: Starting corner frequency of unaliased range
parameter_descriptions.freq2: Ending corner frequency of unaliased range
parameter_descriptions.deriv: Set to 1 to take vertical derivative on pick section (useful for velocity interpolation)
parameter_descriptions.linear: Set to 0 for 8 point sinc temporal interpolation, 1 for linear temporal interpolation
parameter_descriptions.lent: Number of time samples to smooth for dip estimate
parameter_descriptions.lenx: Number of traces to smooth for dip estimate
parameter_descriptions.lagc: Number of ms agc for dip estimate
parameter_descriptions.xopt: 0=compute spatial derivative via FFT, 1=compute via differences (for irregular spacing)
parameter_descriptions.iopt: 0=interpolate, 1=output low-pass model, 2=output dip picks in units of samples/trace
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
